mapper.insert: insert into users(usersid , username , password , realname , sex , birthday , contact , image , regdate ) values(#{usersid} , #{username} , #{password} , #{realname} , #{sex} , #{birthday} , #{contact} , #{image} , #{regdate} )
mapper.update: update users set username=#{username} , password=#{password} , realname=#{realname} , sex=#{sex} , s_school=#{s_school},b_school=#{b_school},b_adress=#{b_adress},birthday=#{birthday} , contact=#{contact} , image=#{image} , regdate=#{regdate} where usersid=#{usersid}
mapper.select: select a.* from users a order by usersid desc
